Bot: Hi, I am product bot of redect 30 and I can answer questions about our product
User: What is redtech30?
Bot: <Company description>
User: Tell me more about your Ml solutions
Bot: <list down Ml products>
User: What features does Ml learn product provude?
Bot: <list down the features>
User: Can I get a demo?
Bot: I can put you in touch with someone in my team would you like that
User: Yes sure
Bot: <Get the user information>
User: <gives the information>
Bot: Ypu will hear from us shortly with a scheduled demo
User: Thank you
